text:
Ueno | Technical Director | SF (US only) | Full-Time | https://ueno.co/about

Ueno is a full-service agency, busy designing and building beautiful digital products, brands, and experiences.

- React, React Native, TypeScript, Mobx, MST, Prismic, GitHub, Heroku, and the next tech you feel relevant.

- Medical, Dental, and Vision Coverage, 401K Matching Pre-tax Commuter Benefits, 22.5 days PTO + 10 days sick leave, Parental leave, $1,000 birthday bonus, $100/month fitness stipend, $1,000 annual learning stipend, $2,500 annual conference stipend

- We will only consider candidates with US work permits

- Ueno is a firmly committed Equal Opportunity Employer

https://ueno.co/careers/6R83B6qvcWgUuiUC0MM4cq/technical-dir...
